review: Chromcast does not work very well with Chrome browser. Isnt that a bummer? When you cast your browser, there is a significant delay, which is very annoying. I have gone and tried to change the settings and adjust the speeds but this only helped a little. I prefer to connect the old way (with cables between the computer and the TV) when casting the Chrome browser. I would give it a 1 star, but it works great with Netflix and YouTube so far.

review: Omg for $35 this was a good buy. I know people complain about the lack of apps but for now I am very happy with being able to cast Netflix to my tv. A must buy for if you have kids and want to monitor what they watch.

review: Great product!Had been using blue ray for watching YouTube, Netflix etc and really frustrated with slow search and long buffering time compared to iPad.  Was planning on dedicating a computer to watching but this solved problem quickly and for $30.Only installation challenge wa 4 year old FIOS router had to be configured to use WEP2 so chrome cast could connect.  Figuring out router settings was hardest part.
